mapper.select: SELECT ATT_ARRIVE_TIME FROM USER_ATT_TB WHERE (USER_ID = #{user_id}) AND ATT_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT UA.USER_ID as userid , ATT_ARRIVE_TIME as atttime, BOOK_TIME as booking, SEAT_NFC_TAG_ID as seatid, ATT_DATE as today , att_leave_time as leave FROM USER_ATT_TB UA LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID, SEAT_NFC_TAG_ID, BOOK_TIME, SEATED_DATE FROM USER_SEAT_TB US JOIN SEAT_TB ST ON (US.SEAT_ID = ST.SEAT_ID AND US.OFFICE_SEQ = ST.OFFICE_SEQ) ) US ON (UA.USER_ID = US.USER_ID AND (TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SEATED_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD'))) WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AND UA.USER_ID = #{userid} ORDER BY UA.ATT_ARRIVE_TIME ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
